about_the_game:
Featuring all the music from the game, the Conclave original soundtrack was composed and orchestrated by Sam Hulick, best known for his award-winning work on the Mass Effect trilogy. Files are provided in MP3 format.

Tracklist


1. Turn of the Age [2:07]
2. Stepping Stones [1:06]
3. Harbingers of War [1:07]
4. Seed of Nightmare [2:18]
5. The Pillar's Heart [1:04]
6. Dream's Return [2:22]
detailed_description:
Featuring all the music from the game, the Conclave original soundtrack was composed and orchestrated by Sam Hulick, best known for his award-winning work on the Mass Effect trilogy. Files are provided in MP3 format.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Mavericks (10.9) or later
  • Storage: 20 MB available space

name: Conclave Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, or 10
  • Storage: 20 MB available space

short_description: Six tracks of orchestral fantasy music created for Conclave by award-winning composer Sam Hulick.
